column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda no mu no a atsɛmbuafo buu atsɛn no
column3: ɔkɔm baa asaase no do. Na banyin bi a ofi Bɛtlɛhɛm a ɔwɔ Juda tutui kɛtsenaa Moabman mu

column2: "Na banyin no ne dzin dze Elimelek
column3: na ne yer dzin dze Naomi
column4: na ne mbabanyin beenu no edzin nye Malon na Kilion
column5: wɔyɛ Efratfo a wofi Bɛtlɛhɛm a ɔwɔ Juda. Na wɔbaa Moabman mu

column2: "Na Naomi no kun Elimelek wui; na ɔkaa ɔnoara
column3: na ne mbabanyin beenu no."

column2: "Na wɔwarwaar yernom wɔ Moab mbaa no mu; ɔbaako ne dzin dze Orpa
column3: na ɔbaako no so ne dzin dze Rut: na wɔtsenaa hɔ araa bɛyɛ mfe du."

column2: "Na Malon na Kilion beenu nyina so wuwui. Na no (Naomi) kun na ne mba beenu no nyina wu ekyir no
column3: ɔkaa no nko."

column2: "Nna ɔnye ne nsewnom no soɛree dɛ wɔresan efi Moabman mu akɔ: osiandɛ ɔtsee no wɔ hɔ mbrɛ EWURADZE esi abɛsera ne man dɛ ɔrema hɔn edziban."
"Na osii mu fii beebi mbrɛ ɔwɔ no
column3: na ne nsewnom beenu no ka no ho; na wosii kwan do dɛ wɔresan akɔ Juda asaase do."

column2: "Na Naomi see ne nsewnom beenu no dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ
column4: obiara nsan nkɔ ne na fie: EWURADZE nye hom ndzi no ayamuyie mu
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hom nye ewufo no na emi edzi no no."

column2: "EWURADZE mma onsi hom yie
column3: ma hom mu biara nnya ahomgye wɔ no kun fie. Nna ɔfeew hɔn ano; na wɔmemaa hɔn ndze do

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Dabida
column4: mbom yɛnye wo bɛsan akɔ wo nkorɔfo nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Naomi see dɛ
column3: Me mbabaa
column4: hom nsan hom ekyir; ebɛnadze ntsi na hom nye me bɔkɔ? Ana meda ho wɔ mbabanyin wɔ me yamu

column2: "Me mbabaa
column3: hom nsan hom ekyir
column4: wɔnkɔ hom kwan; na menyin dodow dɛ mibenya kun. Sɛ mese dɛ
column6: na mpo mirinya kun anadwe yi

column2: "ana dɛm ntsi nkyɛ hom bɔtweɔn ma woeenyinyin anaa? Ana nkyɛ dɛm ntsi hom besiw homho kwan dɛ wɔnkɔhwehwɛ kunnom? Dabida
column3: me mbabaa; ɔyɛ me awerɛhow dodow wɔ hom ntsi
column4: na EWURADZE nsa asoɛr etsia me."

column2: "Na wɔmemaa hɔn ndze do
column3: na wosuu bio: na Orpa feew n’asew no ano na ɔsanee; na Rut dze

column2: "Na Naomi see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: wo korafowa asan n’ekyir kɔ no nkorɔfo nkyɛn
column5: na ne nyame nkyɛn: san kedzi wo korafowa no ekyir."

column2: "Nna Rut see Naomi dɛ
column3: Mma nhyɛ me dɛ mendan wo ngya
column4: na mingyaa w’ekyir dzi nsan nkɔ: na beebiara mbrɛ ebɔkɔ no
column6: na mobɔsoɛ: wo nkorɔfo bɛyɛ mo nkorɔfo
column7: na wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ me Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "mbrɛ ibowu ada
column3: na mubowu ada
column4: na hɔ ara na wobesie me. Na sɛ mema biribiara
column6: paa emi na ɔwo ntamu a
column7: EWURADZE mma dza ɔyɛ yaw nyɛ me

column2: "Na aber a ohun dɛ ɔayɛ n’adwen dzendzenndzen dɛ ɔnye no bɔkɔ no
column3: ogyaa dɛ ɔkasa kyerɛ no wɔ ho."

column2: "Nna hɔn beenu no kɔree araa kodur Bɛtlɛhɛm. Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: wodur Bɛtlɛhɛm no
column4: kurow no nyinara bɔɔ twitwi baa hɔn nkyɛn

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Mma wɔmmfrɛ me Naomi a ase nye nyia ɔadom no no
column4: mbom wɔmfrɛ me Mara: osiandɛ Otumfo nye me edzi no wenwen dodow."

column2: "Mokɔr no ma
column3: na EWURADZE dze me pan aba fie bio: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom frɛ me Naomi
column4: aber a EWURADZE ebua me atsɛn
column5: na Otumfo no atseetsee me yi?"

column2: "Dɛm na Naomi na n’asew Rut
column3: Moabnyi a ofi Moabman mu no sii sanee bae: na wobodur Bɛtlɛhɛm wɔ atoko twaber ahyɛse mu."
